item.title: After Brian Kelly's Firing, LSU is Now Looking For a New Athletic Director
item.description: LSU announced that athletic director Scott Woodward is out on Thursday.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Ravens' Win Over the Dolphins
item.description: Are the Ravens back after beating the Dolphins? Here's what Greg Auman took away from Baltimore's Thursday night win.

item.title: Minor Leaguer to a World Series Legend in ONE Year: Trey Yesavage's Fast Rise
item.description: Trey Yesavage's incredible Game 5 outing, and his rapid rise with the Blue Jays, will be remembered for a long time.

item.title: 'Live and Learn': 3 Years After Failure, Chris Bassitt Finding His Redemption
item.description: Chris Bassitt's road to being a relief pitcher in the World Series wasn't an easy one, but he's carved out an important role with the Blue Jays.

item.title: Heisman Trophy Rankings: Haynes King, Julian Sayin Lead Robert Griffin III's List
item.description: FOX Sports college football analyst Robert Griffin III shares his updated Heisman Trophy front-runners heading into Week 10.
